title: looking for bronze players wanting to climb
body: looking for bronze players that want to join my team i main mid,  i am just looking for any role

replies.body: invite me to your ranked 5. top main.
I main jungle Vi and Yi. Trying to get Rengar as one of my mains too

I'm looking as well, I play top, mid, and bot. Sometimes Jng.

Been playing since 2009 and keep getting plagued by leavers, afk'rs and feeders in bronze. So tired of it.  I quit and come back out of boredom but if I have a regular group to play with that does well i'll stick with it.

-Cyrptfox
add me im always keen. PatrikkStar

Im interested too, sick of playing randoms

add me
hey i wouldn't mind joining u
